descriptionHtml:
Dwarven Golden Pack

This effects only the Dwarven Centurian Bots:
dwarven sphere centurion
dwarven spider centurion
dwarven steam centurion

This makes them look more golden than the original files.
I'll be trying to get an in-game screenshot before posting this...

All you need to do is to copy the Folder Textures to your data folder under Skyrim.

Requirements - Vanilla Skyrim Or with any/All Dlc's.
NOT TESTED ON SPECIAL EDITION!!! I Still have to download/Install my Special Edition
version.
author: FF - FlatFoot
